description:
Montreal, Jan. 21, 2013 - Alexandre Bourget presents Ansible, an open-source software platform for configuring and managing computers.

Useful links:

* Ansible: http://ansible.cc/ + https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ansible_(software)
* Alexandre: http://blog.abourget.net/
* MP34: http://montrealpython.org/2013/01/mp34/
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: System provisioning with Ansible -- a live demo
